description:
DO YOU WANT TO OPEN A NEW STATION IN THE BOOK OF HISTORY OF YOUR LIFE? Do you have other ways to communicate? TELL ME ABOUT THIS . it should be easier to talk somewhere else.My name is Mohamed, I am 49 years old. and I want to love and be loved. I need a reliable life partner, with whom I will have common goals, with which I can look in the same direction and be confident in our future. I want to wake up in the morning in front of loving eyes and smile at my future wife.
Thank you for reading my letter, if you are interested in me, answer me and we will be able to know each other more than there is in my profile.
